participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated individual with a passion for animals and community service.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Chris
participant_2.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys dance and has a fondness for classic music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block.

content.text: I am great, how are you?
I like to volunteer at the shelter
I do like music. I like music.
